vsParam:
Hey, [px]!
It's crowded near the bulletin board, what's going on?

Excuse me, let us see it! This is not working... There are
too many people, we can't even see the board...

Ah, [px]! You are interested, right? The Student Union
posted that it will bring in the Adventurer System!

Ah, the Student Union posted that it will bring in the
Adventurer System, we must work harder for it!

Yeah. Actually, after you told us about the Adventurer
System, it became a hot topic among some students.
Don't you know about it?

You can go to distant places freely without a license...
Why would be trouble yourselves to be adventurers?

Trouble? Ah haha... But I understand them.
Because it's pretty cool!

Yeah! The Student Union seems to think that this is a
wonderful system. So they decide to set up one!

I heard that some students have begun to accept
commissions as adventurers in private, the Student
Union must also think this system could work.

What... How can this thing happen?
Adventures are associated with dangers...

It can improve the students' strengths, while settling
the commissions the Academy receives... I think this
is killing two birds with one stone.

I feel we are being used by the Student Union...
But it does sound found, I am in!

Uh!? Er...
Are you all joining it?

Uh? This whole thing is because everyone worships
you and wants to be like you, why are you so gloomy?

Hmm... But I am not as
good as everyone thinks.

Because there are only 3 alchemists in Arland,
that's why I got a chance to be an adventurer...

What? Only 3!?
But I bet this number is a decisive factor, right?

Apart from alchemy, I am basically useless...
Some adventurer friends even called me clumsy...

So, if the students of Alchemy in the Academy get
serious, they'll excel me pretty soon...

Ah... Ah ha ha ha!
T, Totori, you fool!?

F, fool!?
Boo-hoo, I do have a slow mind...

That's why I called you a fool!
Whom do you think promoted the establishment
of the Adventurer System?

Exactly! The students can only go on adventures
because of the map you plotted.

Yes. You possess the power others don't.
So, don't be stressed.

That's right! If you are still worried,
go with us and upgrade your adventurer's level here!

Guys... Thank you!
I'll do my best!

Alright! Since it's settled...
Let's seize the opportunity and take a commission!

Uh huh.
For an adventurer, this is a good first step, right?

By the way... What's on the bulletin board?
I don't think the Adventurer System alone
would cause such a heated response, right?

You've got a point.
Let me see... Uh? Um——!?

W, what's this!?
It's signed by the Student Union President...

Uh? For student who reaches the highest level in
the shortest time... A dating coupon with... me will
be given!?

Hazel really knows how to arouse everyone's
enthusiasm... Everybody is working hard to date you.

It's not very nice to make other people a reward
without consent...
Uh——! [px], why are you also like that!?

A, anyway, making this dating coupon without
asking me, puts me in a very awkward situation!

But what's done is done...
Now I must be the first one to reach the highest level!

Yeah, that's the spirit!
Do your best, Totori!
